SELECT oel.*, ui.name as username, ui.images AS userImages, oe.title, oe.live_url, oe.is_vip_only, oe.start_time, oe.end_time, oe.cover_image FROM online_event_logs oel LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = oel.user_id) LEFT JOIN online_events oe ON (oe.id = oel.event_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oe.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.title},'%')
AND ui.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryParam.username},'%')
ORDER BY oel.enter_time DESC
